sqlMap.select: SELECT A.IDX AS POST_ID, A.NAME AS USR_NM, A.TITLE, A.USE_YN AS READ_CNT, A.REGDATE AS REG_DT FROM T_HELP A ORDER BY A.IDX DESC LIMIT #targetPage#, #rowSize#
SELECT IDX AS POST_ID, TITLE, CONTENT AS CONTENTS, REGDATE AS REG_DT, USE_YN AS READ_CNT, NAME AS USR_ID FROM T_HELP WHERE IDX = #postId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO T_HELP (IDX, NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, USE_YN, REGDATE) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(IDX) + 1 FROM T_HELP), 'test', #title#, #contents#, 0, SYSDATE);
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_HELP SET TITLE = #title#, CONTENT = #contents# WHERE IDX = #postId#
